strong.span: INFORMATION ON SCHOOL CLOSINGS AND DELAYS

div.p: Decisions to close or delay school openings will be broadcast over KSST Radio (1230 AM) & TV Channel 18, KSCH Star Country Radio (95.9), and KETR (88.9 FM) at or before 6:00 am. Please listen for the announcements instead of calling the stations for information. The SSISD Blackboard Callout system may also be used.
Information will also be posted on the following TV channels: KLTV Channel 7, WFAA Channel 8, Fox Channel 4, KXAS Channel 5, and KTVT Channel 11.

strong.span: SSISD BLACKBOARD CONNECT CALL OUT SYSTEM

div.div: Sulphur Springs Independent School District uses Blackboard Connect for our notification service. With the Blackboard Connect service, Sulphur Springs ISD can send time-sensitive messages to students and staff via telephone, e-mail and SMS (text) within minutes. The Blackboard Connect service will be used for timely district-wide notifications regarding school events, closings or delays and will complement our emergency preparedness procedures. YOU DO NOT HAVE TO SIGN UP, IF YOU HAVE A CHILD IN SSISD OR IF YOU ARE AN EMPLOYEE OF SSISD YOU ARE ALREADY IN THE SYSTEM. You can go to the parent portal below to take control of your notification preferences but this is not a requirement.

div.p: The mission of the Sulphur Springs Independent School District is to provide students with the skills that will prepare them to adapt and excel in a fast-changing world, enabling them to lead productive lives. The district shares with parents and the community the responsibility of promoting high standards and expectations as we provide opportunities for all students within our diverse community to attain personal growth and to become lifelong learners.
